title: Mayfair Open
text:
The Mayfair Open, also sometimes referred to as the Sanford Women's Open, was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="LPGA%20Tour">LPGA Tour</a>, played only in 1959. It was played at the Mayfair Country Club in <a href="Sanford%2C%20Florida">Sanford, Florida</a>. <a href="Marlene%20Hagge">Marlene Hagge</a> won the event.
<a href="Barbara%20Romack">Barbara Romack</a>, winner of the <a href="U.S.%20Women%27s%20Amateur">U.S. Women's Amateur</a> in 1954, made her professional debut at the event.
